97.movie_plot: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

96.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

102.movie_name: Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc, The (1999)

112.movie_plot: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

86.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

105.movie_plot: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error, and becomes an enemy of the state.

107.movie_plot: In 1962, the United States government enlists the help of Mutants with superhuman abilities to stop a malicious dictator who is determined to start World War III.

104.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

41.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

0.movie_plot: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

77.movie_plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

62.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

23.movie_plot: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality.

46.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

68.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)

51.movie_plot: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

67.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

54.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

59.movie_plot: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

65.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

58.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

17.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
17.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

57.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.
